title: The police forced the Evil Grass to shut down the Patriot Picano Park in Chicano Park?
subtitle: No violence broke out in San Diego Historical Park in honour of the Latin heritage of the city, although the police ordered extreme right-wing activists to leave the building after rising tensions with a rival group.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: Trump's pro-Donald activists were arrested by a violent group while eating pizza at Chicano Park.
